CHAT.comment: Dear mom , I love you. I love you all in my heart. I love my nana and papa they are nice to me. I love my cousins joe and tony. I go to church on Sunday. I go to C.C.d.

not really a letter although it is addressed to dear mom; It is more of a list of who she loves and what she does. Chi comes up with the content and writes letter quietly. Mot explains to EXPs that she is letting Chi write the letter without too many corrections which has been suggested by Chi's teacher; Mot helps with spacing of words , punctuation and spelling when Chi asks for help

u.a: like when drawing , Chi works quietly and intensely
BRO is hugging Mot , and Sis is watching Chi over Mot's shoulder
Chi starts to write lovey , love you as one word and then crosses out the y and writes you after
Chi writing second I love you ?
moves letter toward herself and changes thay to they .
to INV2 , but they'll get the idea; you know basically you'll get the main idea I'm sure of what the words should be; you know there might be , it's usually just one letter she might spell wrong

to INV2 , it does take them a while if they don't know what should be capitalized and what shouldn't; that's more like kinda she gets mixed up on; and sometimes not leaving like a space after the words you know
Chi consistently pauses when she reaches the end of a line
